mapper.insert: insert into video (id, video_new_name, video_url, area_type_id, video_type_id, update_time, create_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{videoNewName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{videoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{videoTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, now())
mapper.update: update video set video_new_name = #{videoNewName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, video_url = #{videoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area_type_id = #{areaTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, video_type_id = #{videoTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
